| icon           = poe2 ring_iron icon.png
| description    = This ring is an heirloom of an Aedyran mercenary company, the Motherless Curs. Never a prestigious group, the mercenaries were not overburdened with any sense of loyalty, honor, or fair play. Each member endlessly plotted against the current commander, often claiming the position with a dagger to the back. Assuming command, the traitor would also acquire the ring as a symbol of rank. The ring was worn by fighters, barbarians, ciphers, and all other variety of people skilled in the art of violence. Each of them claimed the ring heightened their unique abilities with some sort of charm.

It was last seen worn by Haelion, a rogue operating in the Dyrwood. It is notable that Haelion had no known connection to the Curs. How he acquired the ring is unknown, but it is unlikely its former owner parted with it willingly.
